con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="FedPSCustomerService" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salle/services/customer" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salle/services/customer" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salle/services/customer" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="address" type="tns:addressIO"/> <xs:element name="parcel" type="tns:parcel"/> <xs:element name="submit" type="tns:submit"/> <xs:element name="submitResponse" type="tns:submitResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="submit"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="request" type="tns:customerInput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="customerInput"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="follow_parcels"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:customerInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcels"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="identifier" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="quote"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:customerInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currency" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="depth" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="from" type="tns:addressIO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="height" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="pickup" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="shipping" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="to" type="tns:addressIO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="unitSize" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="unitWeight" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="weight" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="width" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="addressIO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetNb" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="streetName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="zipCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cityName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="countryCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="parcel-from-quote"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:customerInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cardNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="from" type="tns:addressIO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="pickup" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quoteId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receiver" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sender" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="senderEmail" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="to" type="tns:addressIO"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="parcel"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:customerInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="sender" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="senderEmail" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cardNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receiver" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="from" type="tns:addressIO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="to" type="tns:addressIO"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="shipping" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="pickup" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="eta" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cost" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="currency" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="width" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="height" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="depth" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="unitSize" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="weight" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="unitWeight" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="submitResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="result" type="tns:jobResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="jobResult"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="quoteResult"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quoteId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cost" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="eta" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="listOfFollow"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="data"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="information" type="tns:follow"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="follow"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="eta" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="status" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="processed"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:jobResult"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="eta" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="parcelId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="BadJobFault" type="tns:BadJobFault"/> <xs:complexType name="BadJobFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="message" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="submit"> <wsdl:part element="tns:submit" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="submitResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:submitResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="BadJobFault"> <wsdl:part element="tns:BadJobFault" name="BadJobFault"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="Customer"> <wsdl:operation name="submit"> <wsdl:input message="tns:submit" name="submit"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:submitResponse" name="submitResponse"></wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault message="tns:BadJobFault" name="BadJobFault"></wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="FedPSCustomerServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:Customer"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="submit"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="submit"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="submitResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="BadJobFault"> <soap:fault name="BadJobFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="FedPSCustomerService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:FedPSCustomerServiceSoapBinding" name="FedPSCustomerPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/webservices/FedPS-Customer"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://localhost:8080/"> <resource path="/manager"> <resource path="/delayed_parcels"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/parcels/{id}"> <param name="id" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/stats"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/stats/{status}"> <param name="status" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>

con:request.name: Ask parcel
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:cus="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salle/services/customer"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <cus:submit> <request xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:type="cus:parcel"> <sender>Aquila Lang</sender> <senderEmail>Aquila.Lang@mail.com</senderEmail> <cardNumber>316716254161</cardNumber> <receiver>Mary Holcomb</receiver> <from> <streetNb>P.O. Box 119, 9819</streetNb> <streetName>Nulla Avenue</streetName> <zipCode>36206</zipCode> <countryCode>US</countryCode> </from> <to> <streetNb>P.O. Box 655, 9806</streetNb> <streetName>Consectetuer Rd.</streetName> <zipCode>47269</zipCode> <countryCode>US</countryCode> </to> <shipping>EXPRESS</shipping> <pickup>1417302000000</pickup> <currency>USD</currency> <width>10</width> <height>10</height> <depth>10</depth> <unitSize>INCH</unitSize> <weight>20</weight> <unitWeight>LBS</unitWeight> </request> </cus:submit> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
